      • isTaxonomic

        boolean isTaxonomic​(S searchParameter)
        Returns true if the search parameter is taxonomic related and hence will be determined by which checklist is in use.
        Parameters:
        searchParameter -
        Returns:
        true if a taxonomic parameter

      • includeNullInPredicate

        default boolean includeNullInPredicate​(org.gbif.api.model.predicate.SimplePredicate<S> predicate)
        Adds an "is null" filter if the mapper instructs to do it for the specific predicate. Used mostly in range queries to give specific semantics to null values.

      • includeNullInRange

        default boolean includeNullInRange​(S param,
                                   org.elasticsearch.index.query.RangeQueryBuilder rangeQueryBuilder)
        Adds an "is null" filter if the mapper instructs to do it for the range query. Used mostly in range queries to give specific semantics to null values.
